Key Match Events: Cristian Javier got one out, and J.P. France got two before being removed from the game.
Corey Seager hit a 440-foot home run.
Evan Carter and Adolis Garc√≠a scored runs via a single and a pop-fly bounce.
Mitch Garver scored on a sharp single to left by Jonah Heim.
Post-Match Reflections: Houston manager Dusty Baker expressed pride in the team's resilience after the loss.
Alex Bregman acknowledged the team's lack of execution as the reason for the loss.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Astros are the only big league team to lose four home games in a seven-game postseason series.
No team with a losing record at home has ever reached the World Series.
